result.name: decc_bonus_payments_2010-11
result.notes:
Non Consolidated performance related payments made by Department of Energy and Climate Change to staff since financial year end March 2011
Department for Energy and Climate Change was closed in July 2016. It was replaced by the establishment of the Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy in the same month. Similar data for the new department is available under the new department.

odi-certificate.title: Bonus Payments in Department of Energy and Climate Change 2010-2011

organization.name: department-of-energy-and-climate-change
organization.title: Department of Energy and Climate Change
organization.description: The Department of Energy & Climate Change (DECC) closed in July 2016. DECC worked to make sure the UK has secure, clean, affordable energy supplies and promote international action to mitigate climate change.

result.title: DECC (Department of Energy and Climate Change) non-consolidated performance related payments
